explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a gray hat, white hoodie, and black pants with white stripes is half-squatting, pointing his finger at the screen of a mobile phone on the table, looking at the timer on the phone, which shows 00:00. There is a white storage basket next to the table. The walls of the room are white with white cabinets hanging on them.
[0-2] Immediately, the man taps the phone screen, picks up a white storage basket from the table, and runs away.
[0-2] Immediately, the man taps the phone screen, picks up a white storage basket from the table, and runs away.

[2-4] Then, the man runs to another room with a row of toys on the gray carpet. He crawls on the ground, pushes the storage basket forward with his hands to collect the toys on the ground, picks up the basket, and leaves the room. There is a bed and a mirror on the beige wall in the room.

[4-7] Subsequently, the man runs to another room, slips on the floor, and wipes the white stain from the floor onto his clothes. He quickly gets up and continues running. The room has brown flooring, a black shelf with decorations, green plants next to it, and a round mirror on the wall.

The room has gray walls and a white door.
